description: Try our easy to follow Pull-Apart Garlic, Herb & Cheese Bread recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pull-apart bread,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Pull-Apart Garlic, Herb & Cheese Bread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine flour, parmesan and 2 tsp salt in a bowl. Stir in parsley, reserving about 1 tbs. Add yoghurt, oil and garlic and stir to form a soft dough. Turn out onto a floured surface and knead briefly until smooth. Divide dough into 12 even pieces and shape into balls.
Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Line a 22cm-base ovenproof frying pan or baking tin with non-stick baking paper.
Arrange dough balls into prepared pan, fitting them in snugly. Brush tops with whisked egg and sprinkle with tasty cheese and reserved parsley. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden. Serve warm.
